root.name: Incognito
root.description: OverviewIncognito is an ongoing episodic game (as of August 2011, 3 episodes are out and a fourth is being worked on), and is both developed and published by Magrathean Technologies. GameplayIncognito is an absolute mix of genres:When the player's on foot, Incognito is an FPS with RPG elementsWhen the player's aboard their ship, the game plays like a Combat Simulation with space exploration and trading elementsWhen the player's in the orbit of a planet, Incognito takes the form of a simple RTS gameWhen the player's in their vehicle, the game turns into a Tank Combat game System RequirementsMinimumRecommendedOperating System: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor: Pentium 4 2.8 GHz (3.2 GHz for Vista), Core 2.0 GHz (2.2 GHz for Vista), Athlon 2800+ (3200+ for Vista)RAM Memory: 1 GB (1.5GB on Windows Vista)Video Memory: 256 MBVideo Card: GeForce 6800 GT, Radeon 9800 Pro (Radeon X800 Pro for Vista)Hard Drive Space: 3 GBSound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatibleDirectX: DirectX 9.0cOperating System: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor: Core 2 Duo/Athlon X2 or betterRAM Memory: 1.5 GBVideo Memory: 512 MBVideo Card: NVIDIA 7800 Series, ATI Radeon 1800 Series or betterHard Drive Space: 3 GBSound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatibleDirectX: DirectX 9.0c
